### The subscription includes

applies to all subscription plans

[**Unlimited integrations**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFeeCollapseOne)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   over 1300 e-commerce integrations (including marketplace platforms, online stores, carriers and many more)
*   access to all integrations from one panel without having to log in to each account separately
*   ability to integrate any number of systems in any configuration
*   all integrations available during the free trial period and then at subscription price (does not apply to wholesale integrations outside of BaseLinker Connect)
*   no restrictions to the number of accounts connected even within the same marketplace or carrier

[See the range of integrations Base.com has to offer](https://baselinker.com/en-US/integrations/)

[**Marketplace Manager**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFeeCollapseTwo)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   list products from any warehouse (store, wholesaler, ERP or Base.com warehouse)
*   quick listing tools (including parameter auto-fill, offer templates, shipping templates and category links)
*   list product variants
*   bulk operations on multiple offers at the same time
*   forward orders from marketplace to store and ERP
*   automatic stock synchronization between marketplace platforms and product warehouse
*   ability to automatically close out of stock offers
*   automatic offer price synchronization with prices in the main warehouse
*   ability to automatically close zero-price offers

[Explore the other functions of the Marketplace Manager](https://baselinker.com/en-US/functions/marketplace-manager/)

[**Order Manager**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFeeCollapseThree)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

*   managing orders from marketplaces, stores, placed by phone or in person
*   fast order processing thanks to automatic actions
*   automatic forwarding of dropshipping orders (for wholesalers)
*   ability to forward orders to the store and ERP
*   Pick&Pack Assistant support (packing error warnings, taking photo of the shipment)
*   shipping packages (one by one, in bulk, automatically)
*   issuing invoices, proforma's, corrections and receipts as well as forwarding to online accounting systems
*   automatic email and SMS notifications to customers and a unique order information page
*   phone app displaying orders for the calling customer

[Explore the other Order Manager functions](https://baselinker.com/en-US/functions/orders-manager/)

[**Shipping management**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFeeCollapseFour)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   instant access to multiple courier integrations
*   shipping packages (one by one, in bulk, automatically)
*   ordering a pick-up
*   forwarding tracking number to the marketplace and store
*   automatic printouts of the shipping labels and shipping manifest
*   customer updates on shipping number and package status
*   ability to create your own shipment size and weight templates
*   ability to monitor shipment statuses, delivery time, and each package's history
*   automatic verification of package delivery

[Explore the other benefits of Base.com shipping management](https://baselinker.com/en-US/functions/shipping-management/)

[**Workflow automation**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFeeCollapseFive)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   unlimited number of automatic actions, e.g. in status changes, issuing invoices, sending parcels, customer correspondence
*   Pick&Pack Assistant support - use a barcode scanner for product picking and parcel packing
*   fast printing of documents and shipping labels without the need to download files
*   trigger system actions with a keyboard shortcut, custom button or by scanning the barcode
*   information on the status of customer orders visible on the phone screen as soon as the caller's number is displayed (with BaseLinker Caller app)

[Find out how to automate your business](https://baselinker.com/en-US/functions/workflow-automation/)

[**Product warehouse**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFeeCollapseSix)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   ability to create custom product database in the Base.com system (designed for retailers without a store)
*   ability to add an additional product catalogue from an online storefront (designed for store owners)
*   quick product listing to marketplaces directly from Base.com's warehouse
*   stock and price synchronization between warehouse and marketplace services
*   multiple ways to import products into warehouse: manually, by importing XML, or CSV files, or by creating products directly in the warehouse
*   ability to quickly export data using predefined templates or custom templates formats with selected content

[Find out more about the capabilities of Base.com Warehouse](https://baselinker.com/en-US/functions/product-storage/)

[**Online access from any device**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFeeCollapseSeven)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*   Base.com runs in a web browser - you can run the system on any device with Internet access
*   seamless access to cloud-based data
*   data security - backups created twice a day

[**Team profiles**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFeeCollapseEight)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

*   employee profiles with separate logins and passwords
*   ability to define user privileges and access areas
*   verification of actions performed by employees
*   ability to create automatic actions with user-specific conditions
*   employee efficiency tracking
*   ability to set a different panel language version for each employee

###### Frequently Asked Questions

#### [**Can I try the system before buying it?**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFAQcollapseOne)

Before you decide to buy our services, you can test the program without any obligations for 14 days. The system is fully functional during the test period.

#### [**Can I change the subscription plan I am using?**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFAQcollapseTwo)

You can change your plan from Freemium to Business or from Business to Enterprise. Other plan changes are not possible.

#### [**Can I choose whether I am on the Business plan or the Enterprise plan?**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFAQcollapseThree)

Once you qualify for the Enterprise plan you will be contacted by our team, and to continue to use Base.com, you must switch to a dedicated Enterprise plan.

#### [**When do I need to switch to the Enterprise plan?**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFAQcollapseFour)

Our Enterprise team will contact you when the scale of your business qualifies you for the Enterprise plan.

#### [**Can I use the Enterprise plan when my number of orders and GMV are lower than indicated in the Enterprise plan?**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFAQcollapseFive)

Yes. To do so, schedule a call with our enterprise team using [this link](https://form.jotform.com/baselinker/en-US).

#### [**If I have multiple Base.com accounts, do the volumes add up to determine if I qualify for the Enterprise plan?**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFAQcollapseSix)

Yes, in a situation where you manage your business using multiple accounts, we take into account the aggregated volumes from all accounts to qualify for the Enterprise plan.

#### [**Do you issue VAT invoices?**](https://baselinker.com/cennik/#accFAQcollapseSeven)

Yes, we issue VAT invoices. Subscription for using the system and payment details are described in the [pricing section](https://baselinker.com/en-US/pricing/).
